description: This course will allow through reflection and self-discovery by participants areas of your life that require development, focusing on the investigation of mental patterns and limiting beliefs that each participant has in her life and does not allow you to advance personal development. It will start with the theoretical basis underlying the coaching from the systemic approach grounded in the biology of love, evolution and general systems theory, and then make a diagnosis of his own life through techniques such as wheel life from there to develop and apply simple techniques that enable them to break limiting beliefs and consider alternative development and personal growth.
title: Coaching de Vida
instructors: Ricardo De la Cruz Gil and Oskart Ramírez Guija
